father wants to do is to is to walk his

that was impossible but this was the

say tongue-in-cheek said would be lovely

that's but we didn't come to fruition on

used to go out any any time any weather
but being confined to a wheelchair is
obviously very frustrating at least with
the exoskeleton and I had the chance to
to feel a little bit normal to be back

well I know that we've been working with
